quote: Beware of little expenses. A small leak will sink a great ship.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Under capitalism, man exploits man. Under communism, it's just the opposite.
name: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: In this world nothing can be said to be certain, except death and taxes.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: All money is a matter of belief.
name: Adam Smith

quote: I believe that through knowledge and discipline, financial peace is possible for all of us.
name: Dave Ramsey

quote: The way to make money is to buy when blood is running in the streets.
name: John D. Rockefeller

quote: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
name: Epictetus

quote: Inflation is taxation without legislation.
name: Milton Friedman

quote: A budget tells us what we can't afford, but it doesn't keep us from buying it.
name: William Feather

quote: You and I come by road or rail, but economists travel on infrastructure.
name: Margaret Thatcher

quote: There can be no rise in the value of labour without a fall of profits.
name: David Ricardo

quote: The way to become rich is to put all your eggs in one basket and then watch that basket.
name: Andrew Carnegie

quote: If all the economists were laid end to end, they'd never reach a conclusion.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: About the time we can make the ends meet, somebody moves the ends.
name: Herbert Hoover

quote: Financial crises are like fireworks: they illuminate the sky even as they go pop.
name: James Buchan

quote: It is a kind of spiritual snobbery that makes people think they can be happy without money.
name: Albert Camus

quote: Our goal is to make finance the servant, not the master, of the real economy.
name: Alistair Darling

quote: I'm involved in the stock market, which is fun and, sometimes, very painful.
name: Regis Philbin

quote: Watch your finances like a hawk.
name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: As sure as the spring will follow the winter, prosperity and economic growth will follow recession.
name: Bo Bennett

quote: Here's my gift-giving rule: Respect your current financial situation.
name: Suze Orman

quote: Derivatives are financial weapons of mass destruction.
name: Warren Buffett

quote: The longer I go on, the more I am aware of the power of finance.
name: Justin Welby

quote: Stay on top of your finances. Don't leave that up to others.
name: Leif Garrett

quote: A big part of financial freedom is having your heart and mind free from worry about the what-ifs of life.
name: Suze Orman

quote: Do you know the only thing that gives me pleasure? It's to see my dividends coming in.
name: John D. Rockefeller

quote: I made my money by selling too soon.
name: Bernard Baruch

quote: We teach about how to drive in school, but not how to manage finances.
name: Andy Williams

quote: The poor don't know that their function in life is to exercise our generosity.
name: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: These heroes of finance are like beads on a string; when one slips off, all the rest follow.
name: Henrik Ibsen

quote: Wealth, in even the most improbable cases, manages to convey the aspect of intelligence.
name: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: Money is like manure. You have to spread it around or it smells.
name: J. Paul Getty

quote: It is usually people in the money business, finance, and international trade that are really rich.
name: Robin Leach

quote: Capital is that part of wealth which is devoted to obtaining further wealth.
name: Alfred Marshall

quote: I only make movies to finance my fishing.
name: Lee Marvin

quote: Finance, like time, devours its own children.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: There's more honor in investment management than in investment banking.
name: Charlie Munger

quote: Nobody wants campaign finance reform more than me. It would save me a fortune.
name: Andrew Tobias

quote: It's cheaper to buy a house and finance it than it is to rent in many markets.
name: Barry Sternlicht

quote: But having said that, what's happening with campaign finance reform and our political culture is devastating.
name: Robert McChesney

quote: My dream is universal income, with a completely different fiscal system to finance it.
name: Beppe Grillo

quote: I was a great student at a great school, Wharton School of Finance.
name: Donald Trump

quote: I went to the Wharton School of Finance, the toughest place to get into. I was a great student.
name: Donald Trump

quote: The avoidance of taxes is the only intellectual pursuit that still carries any reward.
name: John Maynard Keynes

quote: Any informed borrower is simply less vulnerable to fraud and abuse.
name: Alan Greenspan

quote: The people who know personal finance hide the money very carefully.
name: James Altucher

quote: I've never preached one sermon on money, on just finances. I want to stay away from it.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: Infinite growth of material consumption in a finite world is an impossibility.
name: E. F. Schumacher

quote: I mean, I'm very serious with my kids about them comprehending the intricacies of global finance.
name: Will Smith

quote: Security depends not so much upon how much you have, as upon how much you can do without.
name: Joseph Wood Krutch

quote: I'm a big advocate of financial intelligence.
name: Daymond John

quote: If it isn't the sheriff, it's the finance company; I've got more attachments on me than a vacuum cleaner.
name: John Barrymore

quote: Financial support is one thing, but I always think what becomes really sacrificial is your time.
name: Cliff Richard

quote: I am a graduate in business management with specialisation in finance, and I love accounts!
name: Tena Desae

quote: I don't really enjoy finance and accounting.
name: Holly Branson

quote: I know what I don't know. To this day, I don't know technology, and I don't know finance or accounting.
name: Bernard Ebbers

quote: We need real campaign finance reform to loosen the grip of special interests on politics.
name: Tom Daschle

quote: How grateful I am for the law of tithing. It is the Lord's law of finance.
name: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: People who think about art as an investment are pathetic.
name: Walter Annenberg

quote: We cannot both preach and administer financial matters.
name: Saint Stephen

quote: Under capitalism each individual engages in economic planning.
name: George Reisman

quote: I finally know what distinguishes man from the other beasts: financial worries.
name: Jules Renard

quote: I do not regard a broker as a member of the human race.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: Finance is a gun. Politics is knowing when to pull the trigger.
name: Mario Puzo

quote: I wasn't a financial pro, and I paid the price.
name: Ruth Handler

quote: One of the biggest issues for me is campaign finance reform.
name: Cameron Russell

quote: As technology progresses, I believe that fintech will fundamentally change finance.
name: Taavet Hinrikus

quote: The rate of interest acts as a link between income-value and capital-value.
name: Irving Fisher

quote: Money is the best rule of commerce.
name: William Petty

quote: My most difficult class at Harvard Business School would have to be finance.
name: Tyra Banks

quote: We at Chrysler borrow money the old-fashioned way. We pay it back.
name: Lee Iacocca

quote: My father, being a Scotsman, taught me to look after finances. I'm shrewd. Some people may call me tight.
name: Rod Stewart

quote: Finance is wholly different from the rest the economy.
name: Alan Greenspan

quote: The people who don't know personal finance have TV shows about it.
name: James Altucher

quote: I am particularly pleased to see that the Bendheim Center for Finance is thriving.
name: Ben Bernanke

quote: There are no patents in finance.
name: Stephen A. Schwarzman

quote: Some of the people in finance touch enormous parts of the economy.
name: Stephen A. Schwarzman

quote: Wall Street has too much wealth and political power.
name: Charlie Munger

quote: My mother works in a bank, and my dad is the head of my management team and also works in finance.
name: Henry Cavill

quote: The important source of finance is now commercial papers, bonds, and so on.
name: Chanda Kochhar

quote: Poverty is unnecessary.
name: Muhammad Yunus

quote: No single housing finance institution should be too big to fail.
name: Jerome Powell

quote: Health care probably contributes a lot more to the common wealth than finance.
name: Timothy Noah

quote: At this point, I don't get hired a lot because people don't think I could finance a movie.
name: Martha Plimpton

quote: What we now call 'finance' is, I hold, an intellectual perversion of what began as warm human love.
name: Robert Graves

quote: When I was the finance minister, I got on well with the RBI Governor.
name: Manmohan Singh

quote: We have to talk about the way we finance campaigns.
name: Dick Durbin

quote: In Britain, polls show large majorities in favour of mansion taxes and higher taxes on the finance sector.

quote: To beat the market you'll have to invest serious bucks to dig up information no one else has yet.
name: Merton Miller

quote: You only need to make one big score in finance to be a hero forever.
name: Merton Miller

name: Merton Miller

quote: Arbitrage proof has since been widely used throughout finance and economics.
name: Merton Miller

quote: My adversary is the world of finance.
name: Francois Hollande

quote: Almost every day, you see an article in the papers about someone violating a campaign finance law.
name: Luther Strange

quote: We all know that Americans love their statistics - in sport, obviously. And in finance too.
name: Evan Davis

name: John Lanchester

name: Moshe Kahlon

quote: The studios don't finance anymore, they get outside funds.
name: Robert Rodriguez

quote: Economically considered, war and revolution are always bad business.
name: Ludwig von Mises

quote: The economy is a very sensitive organism.
name: Hjalmar Schacht

quote: Everyone says you've got to do a foundation and legal structure to finance social change. What nonsense!
name: Bill Drayton

quote: There's no question: the finance market is moving into the cloud.
name: Aneel Bhusri

name: Penelope Spheeris

name: Jamie S. Miller

name: John Cullum

name: Alice Rivlin

name: Alexander John Ellis
